name: Hack'n Sneak
description:
Made by Andres Mora of Pardalis Games

How to Play:

  • Movement: Click player character and while clicking drag to adyacent tiles to trace a path. When the click is released the character will follow the traced path.
  • Recollect key data to turn off laser door.
  • Go through laser door to complete the level.
  • Beware of the enemies! If the see you when you are in adyacent tile to them, then it is Game Over.
